reviews.text: Brooklyn Boys is hands-down our go-to spot for pizza and wings, and they never disappoint! The pizza is always hot, cheesy, and full of flavor‚Äîperfectly cooked every time. The wings? Crispy, saucy, and addictive. While I can‚Äôt speak much on the dine-in atmosphere since we always do takeout, the service is consistently friendly and reliable. They‚Äôre fast, efficient, and the quality is always top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone craving classic, delicious comfort food!

We had driven past this place enough times that we had to give it a try. Especially being from NJ we had to support NY. I stopped in one afternoon and placed a to go order for dinner. We ordered their white pizza pie, their meatza pizza pie, their hawaiian luau pizza pie, mozzarella sticks, and garlic knots. It was all extremely delicious! We will be returning very soon!

I have been ordering take out for quite sometime  now and I am happy every time! I love the coupons that come via email and games that can score discounts. The food is always delicious and fresh. No complaints!

The only pizza worse than BB in Mooresville is the pizza at the movie theater. Not fresh at all! And they add so much sauce with so little cheese that you basically have tomato water dripping off. Service is good but food sucks and we've tried it twice
Brooklyn Boys is fantastic pizza. Big slices. Enough to feed our family of 5. Order online and grab it on the way home. We e never had a bad meal or service here!

editorial_summary.overview: Simple pizza joint with dough & sauce made in-house features New York-style pies, also by the slice.

recentReviews.text:
Regular pizza and cauliflower pizza are amazing and are what we get monthly!

Cauliflower was unavailable last time, so I tried the regular gluten-free pizza and just...blegh. Also don't understand how a gluten-free pizza has a note on it that it's not safe for those with celiac??? (not me, thankfully)
best New York pizza in Mooresville, hands down.

The only pizza worse than BB in Mooresville is the pizza at the movie theater. Not fresh at all! And they add so much sauce with so little cheese that you basically have tomato water dripping off. Service is good but food sucks and we've tried it twice
Amazing place! Always friendly. Great pizza!!

detailedReviews.text: Amazing place! Always friendly. Great pizza!!

detailedReviews.author: Lad Har
detailedReviews.text: The food was top tier, there was a guy yelling while making pizza which i thought that was funny but it everything was great

detailedReviews.author: Paul Piccolo
detailedReviews.text: Casual and friendly atmosphere plus good food! Give them a try.

detailedReviews.author: Tierra Lee
detailedReviews.text: We have been coming to this location for many years and each visit is just as good as the first. Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Marianne C
detailedReviews.text: Amazing NY pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Jess Martin
detailedReviews.text: I have been ordering take out for quite sometime  now and I am happy every time! I love the coupons that come via email and games that can score discounts. The food is always delicious and fresh. No complaints!

detailedReviews.author: Shujaat Khan
detailedReviews.text: Very poor service. Disrespectful staff. Had to wait too long

detailedReviews.author: John Elberfeld
detailedReviews.text: Always good‚Ä¶Great family run business

detailedReviews.author: Vincent S
detailedReviews.text: Best NY style pizza in NC. I come from Brooklyn. I know.

detailedReviews.author: Ashley Beam
detailedReviews.text: Brooklyn Boys is fantastic pizza. Big slices. Enough to feed our family of 5. Order online and grab it on the way home. We e never had a bad meal or service here!

detailedReviews.author: Kris DeRobertis
detailedReviews.text: Great place. Always an amazing experience!  Food is delicious.. ü§§

detailedReviews.author: Joann Nix
detailedReviews.text: Brooklyn Boys Pizza reminds us of where I grew up in NY. I haven't been able to find good pizza before trying a recommendation from a friend. If you want real NY style pizza, try Brooklyn Boys!

detailedReviews.author: shelby hathaway
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza!  Kennedy is a superb cashier!

detailedReviews.author: Tammy Schur
detailedReviews.text: They offer a good selection of menu items, as well as specials.  Staff were friendly and attentive. The food was delicious. Great job!

detailedReviews.author: Benjamin Wood
detailedReviews.text: I am from NJ and this pizza is amazing!

detailedReviews.author: Helena Franco
detailedReviews.text: Brooklyn Boys is hands-down our go-to spot for pizza and wings, and they never disappoint! The pizza is always hot, cheesy, and full of flavor‚Äîperfectly cooked every time. The wings? Crispy, saucy, and addictive. While I can‚Äôt speak much on the dine-in atmosphere since we always do takeout, the service is consistently friendly and reliable. They‚Äôre fast, efficient, and the quality is always top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone craving classic, delicious comfort food!

detailedReviews.author: Alan Mann
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza on Lake Norman!

detailedReviews.author: klep2024
detailedReviews.text: Best Pizza in the Mooresville area and it isn't really close. Great crust, even better sauce. The Brooklyn Deep dish is my go to.

detailedReviews.author: Pumpkins
detailedReviews.text: It could be cleaner, i.e the booths need reuphostering, condiments on table very dirty. Entire restaurant could use a good cleaning. Staff is nice.

detailedReviews.author: David Seeley
detailedReviews.text: I am originally from Queens New York and Brooklyn Boys pizza was the best 45 minutes drive. So worth it made me feel like I was back in NY and still being in NC my new Home. There is no pizza in all of NC I will eat except theirs from now on

detailedReviews.author: Todd Childers
detailedReviews.text: Great food, great folks, fantastic experience!!

detailedReviews.author: Kenea Dekle
detailedReviews.text: My food was delicious and definitely like new york.

detailedReviews.author: Heather Orrill
detailedReviews.text: We love this place! It‚Äôs been our favorite pizza for years in Mooresville, NC! Never dissapoints!

detailedReviews.author: Carol Lance
detailedReviews.text: This was my first time having lunch at Brooklyn Boys!! I came at lunchtime.  Food was great!

detailedReviews.author: Brandy Lewellyn
detailedReviews.text: First time customer! Great experience! The pizza was fantastic! I will be returning!

detailedReviews.author: lt lii
detailedReviews.text: Food is always good and the staff is friendly

detailedReviews.author: Hugo Castellon
detailedReviews.text: Brooklyn Boys Pizzeria in Mooresville has become a family favorite! It‚Äôs not easy to find a place that does both regular and gluten-free pizza well, but they‚Äôve absolutely nailed it. The crust, the sauce, the toppings ‚Äì everything tastes fresh and full of flavor. Whether you‚Äôre gluten-free or not, everyone leaves happy and full. Highly recommend for anyone who loves great pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Victor C
detailedReviews.text: What a huge pizza! Probably 20 inches and apparently that was the only size they had!

detailedReviews.author: Aileen Cooke
detailedReviews.text: Great experience as always! Consistently great food at a fair price, provided by very friendly staff!

detailedReviews.author: Jamie Goodwin
detailedReviews.text: Love this place! Food and service are  consistently wonderful!

detailedReviews.author: Berfie
detailedReviews.text: This is our family go-to spot. Food is consistently delish and service is spot-on. Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: RGB3
detailedReviews.text: Probably the best pizza place in North Carolina.... Facts....

detailedReviews.author: Robert Holman
detailedReviews.text: My kids love this place, as do I!   Went there for lunch today.   I‚Äôm typically a basic pepperoni slice guy.  Today however I tried the Lasagna slice and It was AMAZING!!  Service is always top notch as well!

detailedReviews.author: T D
detailedReviews.text: Food is great. Never had a complaint. The dining room needs some work, it's getting worn out. Broken booths and lopsided tables.

detailedReviews.author: Joshua Roman
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza hands down

detailedReviews.author: Jeannine OConnor
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Mooresville - great staff and great for a big group

detailedReviews.author: Heather Kids Witt
detailedReviews.text: Go with friends after school every day and the workers know we're casuals so we get treated amazing. And the food, wow don't even get me started

detailedReviews.author: Kimberlee Thompson
detailedReviews.text: Their pizza is the best around if you like NY style pizza, and their meatballs are so flavorful. You must add it to your pizza as a topping (along with pepperoni).

detailedReviews.author: Joey Rincon
detailedReviews.text: Solid pizza joint

detailedReviews.author: Elizabeth Miller
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely love this place. Food and service are great! This is our go to for our weekly take out pizza place.

detailedReviews.author: Leigh Bedard
detailedReviews.text: Always on time and the food is excellent

detailedReviews.author: Robert
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was great! Would recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Shelly Bucaccio-Shaw
detailedReviews.text: Favorite pizza place. Always consistently good. I always order online and have never had a problem. Love this place!

detailedReviews.author: Alida Janik
detailedReviews.text: Great food, this will be a regular stop!

detailedReviews.author: Eileen Rielly
detailedReviews.text: The deep dish pizzas are delicious and nice and hot. Request crispy on the bottom to give it a great taste.

detailedReviews.author: Francis Fry
detailedReviews.text: Great place pizza always perfect

detailedReviews.author: chris bauernfeind
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic food! The staff there are fabulous! Thanks so much.

detailedReviews.author: Stacy Johansen
detailedReviews.text: I drive an hour from South Carolina for this amazing pizza!!!!! It‚Äôs got the perfect crust, sauce and right amount of cheese! 10 out 10!!!

detailedReviews.author: Lisa Dress
detailedReviews.text: My family and I are from the New York area and it is hard to find good pizza down here. On a whim we stop in for a slice and it was very good !!! It passed my husband's love for pizza

detailedReviews.author: Maggie McFarland
detailedReviews.text: The garlic knots were so yummy, and owner Keith is so kind! Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: P Cazer
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic pizza and people!

detailedReviews.author: Mary Roadarmel
detailedReviews.text: Best NY style pizza in the area!!

detailedReviews.author: Holli Benfield
detailedReviews.text: We order takeout often, and have enjoyed a few meals inside as well. Every time the food is fresh and absolutely delicious. The service is always great and everyone is super friendly. Also pretty affordable- especially for the quality! Our favorite is the White Pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Steve Pryor
detailedReviews.text: Perfect food and fast as well.  Traveled all around the country as an independent adjuster and the military.  One of the best Calzones I have ever had.

detailedReviews.author: Scott Thayer
detailedReviews.text: Some of the best pizza available in Lake Norman area!

detailedReviews.author: Lindsay Rufino
detailedReviews.text: I love Brooklyn Boys!!! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

detailedReviews.author: Oni Rojas
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza but this restaurant is a cesspool of Covid 19. None of the employees wear a mask or follow the CDC guidelines. Absolutely no sanitary conditions as no one in the kitchen wears mask or gloves. Customers do a better job of wearing a mask but many do not wear a mask because the restaurant employees do not wear one themselves. If you ask an employees why they do not wear a mask. Their response is that the owners don not believe in masks and leave the decision up to the employees. We used to eat there every Friday but had to stop. We cannot even do a take out because we do not want to risk going inside and catching Covid.

detailedReviews.author: George Nathaniel
detailedReviews.text: Great spot for authentic NY pizza!  From New Jersey and these guys are my goto‚Ä¶

detailedReviews.author: T
detailedReviews.text: This is the closest I‚Äôve found to NYC pizza here in the area. My uncle owned many pizzerias in the city growing up‚Ä¶ and I know and love a good authentic slice when I find it.

detailedReviews.author: Maureen Scott
detailedReviews.text: Love Brooklyn Boys and it‚Äôs great that they deliver to HopTown.

detailedReviews.author: Courtney Carlisle
detailedReviews.text:
We order from Brooklyn boys once a week. It‚Äôs the only pizza my daughter will eat!
Friendly staff, great service and super easy to order online and pick up.

detailedReviews.author: Kathleen Ammermuller
detailedReviews.text: The best pizza in the area!  And the people behind the counter are wonderful!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.8/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the amazing quality of both regular and cauliflower pizzas, making them a monthly favorite. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The restaurant is recognized for having the best New York pizza in Mooresville, which sets it apart from competitors. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
Customers appreciate the friendly and casual atmosphere, which enhances their dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews about food quality and service - review management can address this concern
Long wait times and poor service - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Lack of cleanliness and worn-out dining area - social media marketing can improve this area

positive.author: Savanna Baxter
positive.text:
Regular pizza and cauliflower pizza are amazing and are what we get monthly!

Cauliflower was unavailable last time, so I tried the regular gluten-free pizza and just...blegh. Also don't understand how a gluten-free pizza has a note on it that it's not safe for those with celiac??? (not me, thankfully)

negative.text: The only pizza worse than BB in Mooresville is the pizza at the movie theater. Not fresh at all! And they add so much sauce with so little cheese that you basically have tomato water dripping off. Service is good but food sucks and we've tried it twice
